chunks.zh: 离过婚 比 没结婚 强吗？
chunks.en: Is being divorced better than being never married?

chunks.zh: 有工作经验
chunks.en: Has work experience

chunks.zh: 你不要把公司 HR 那一套相人的流程拿出来相亲。结婚等于是合资，你要用风投做尽调的那一套来用
chunks.en: Don't use the company HR's process of evaluating people for matchmaking. Marriage is like a joint venture; you should use the venture capital due diligence approach.

chunks.zh: 见过几个离婚的，基本上都有可见的问题。。。
chunks.en: I've seen a few divorced people, and they all basically have visible problems...

chunks.zh: 学到了东西就是
chunks.en: Learning something is

chunks.zh: 我父母那辈确实是这么想的 你哪怕离过都比一直单身强 它们无法接受别人说自己的孩子没人要 面子上过不去
chunks.en: That's what my parents' generation thinks. Even if you're divorced, it's better than being single all the time. They can't accept others saying their children are unwanted; they can't save face.

chunks.zh: 不是有个段子么？生娃离婚的媒婆会说保证有生育能力。
chunks.en: Isn't there a joke? Matchmakers for divorced people with children will say they guarantee fertility.

chunks.zh: @levelworm #21 简单来说,离婚的可能 50%是对方问题.但是大龄未婚的,100%是自己有问题.
chunks.en: @levelworm #21 Simply put, for divorced people, maybe 50% is the other person’s problem. But for older singles, 100% is their own problem.

chunks.zh: 看年龄，大龄的肯定是这样
chunks.en: It depends on age. It's definitely like this for older people.

chunks.zh: 有工作经验+1
chunks.en: Has work experience +1

chunks.zh: 离过婚, 除非你是有钱人， 否则不会再有竞争力， 毕竟离婚肯定双方都有原因， 不是什么好事。和离过婚的人交往，无论男女， 很快就会发现他们为什么会离婚
chunks.en: Divorced, unless you are rich, you will no longer be competitive, because there are definitely reasons for both parties in a divorce, which is not a good thing. Dating a divorced person, regardless of gender, will soon reveal why they divorced.

chunks.zh: 我们这边好像不是这样，离婚后再谈就算二婚，算减分项
chunks.en: It doesn't seem to be like this here. Dating after a divorce is considered a second marriage, which is a negative.

chunks.zh: 看性别，看年龄，看婚龄，等等，具体情况具体分析啊。如果这些都不考虑，认为离过婚就比没结婚强，那么一般是把结婚本身当成任务，那确实做砸了总比不做强，就像有些老人总爱说，“你结婚，我的任务就完成了”，当然，不过这个任务完成了还有下个任务。
chunks.en: It depends on gender, age, length of marriage, etc. Analyze the specific situation. If you don't consider these and think that being divorced is better than being never married, then you generally treat marriage as a task. It is indeed better to fail at it than not to do it at all, just like some old people always say, 'When you get married, my task is complete.' Of course, there will be another task after this one is completed.

chunks.zh: 玩 MMORPG ，PVE 主线任务道具刷不出来，卡级时你着急不着急？PVP 还打不过别人，你着急不着急？😆
chunks.en: Playing MMORPG, if you can't get the PVE main quest items, are you anxious when you're stuck at a level? If you can't beat others in PVP, are you anxious? 😆

chunks.zh: op 这问题问的幼稚，他明显已经感觉到压力了。
chunks.en: OP's question is naive. He obviously already feels pressured.

chunks.zh: 老观念下，同等条件下离婚算 debuff ，不管是什么原因导致的离婚。但是现阶段下，离婚和分手也没大区别，多一张有法律效应的证而已，早就把本该夫妻干的事提前干了个遍。所以我觉得半斤八两吧
chunks.en: In the old mindset, under the same conditions, divorce is a debuff, regardless of the reason for the divorce. But at this stage, divorce and breakup are not much different, just an extra legally binding certificate, and the things that couples should do have long been done in advance. So I think they are about the same.

chunks.zh: 可以堵住一部分问的人的嘴
chunks.en: It can shut up some of the people who ask questions.

chunks.zh: 大龄是这样
chunks.en: That’s how it is for older people

chunks.zh: @avrillavigne 那么葛二蛋，学费是多少呢😂
chunks.en: @avrillavigne So, what is the tuition for Ge Erdan?😂

chunks.zh: 大龄的（ 35+）是这样，不然人家会怀疑是不是性格有问题，会敬而远之。
chunks.en: That's how it is for older people (35+). Otherwise, people will suspect that there is a problem with your personality and will stay away.

chunks.zh: 世俗观念是的，离婚还可以扯合不来、发现人问题等等。没结过婚单纯就是单纯认为没人要
chunks.en: That's the worldly view. Divorce can also be blamed on incompatibility, discovering problems with the person, etc. Being never married is simply considered unwanted.
